item.title: Magnum + Cluster API
item.description: In this post, I detail how to install Magnum with the Cluster API to create clusters in Openstack.

item.title: Note-taking system using Obsidian and the PARA method
item.description: In this blog post I explain the PARA method and how you should take notes using Obsidian
